content.html: @BriannaWu I'm shameful to admit I don't really understand what Gamergate was other than manpigs in the gaming media/industry being massively sexist in ways that was not a shocking to normal people. What am I missing here? (OH shit, you're the third name on the Wikipedia article)
content.value: @BriannaWu I'm shameful to admit I don't really understand what Gamergate was other than manpigs in the gaming media/industry being massively sexist in ways that was not a shocking to normal people. What am I missing here? (OH shit, you're the third name on the Wikipedia article)

content.html:
Gamergate was v1.0 of a type of online information warfare, extremely effective at weaponing white male rage and radicalizing them into digital soldiers for fringe causes. We still talk about it because the playbook is being used by far more dangerous actors at greater scale.
twitter.com/morrobots/stat…
content.value:
Gamergate was v1.0 of a type of online information warfare, extremely effective at weaponing white male rage and radicalizing them into digital soldiers for fringe causes. 

We still talk about it because the playbook is being used by far more dangerous actors at greater scale.
